text.0: Welcome Player, follow the red blocks to continue.
text.1: I am a Live Environment Escape Computer Helper, Or LEECH, for short.
text.2: I will help you and your co-player to escape this room.
text.3: You can use this computer here to chat with your co-player.
text.4: In these rooms I've hidden clues that will help you to escape.
text.5: Look closely at everything and communicate with your co-player.
text.6: You can use the computers in the side-rooms to ask me for help as well.
text.7: Good luck, you have 15 minutes starting now!
